name: Animatronics Auction
description:
This is a combination of elements of the game FNaF and Clicker, buy animatronics at auction, sell for money and become a millionaire!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Features:

1.This game is not demanding

2.This game is fast paced

3.Individual style

4.There are workers!

5.Several animatronics are for sale!

6.And of course there's William Afton!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The creators:

The Creator of Five Nights at Freddy's:Scott Cawthon

The Creator of the music in this game:TheJurgenator

The Creator of this game:Hirobraine Production
